item.title: WTF is this?
item.author: stuartdadams@gmail.com (Stuart Adams)
item.description: Curiosity killed the cat Are you a C++ student? Do you want to explore all the vile Lovecraftian horrors that lie just beneath the surface? If you’d like to take that first brave step into the abyss, you’re in luck. I’m starting a series of articles called WTF is this? where I will expose newer programmers to the gritty, hair-raising monstrosities that I wish I had learned sooner. When I was a student, I felt like there weren’t a lot of resources out there that approached technical problems in a conversational, non-academic way.
item.dc:creator: Stuart Adams
